prev.title: XY problem
prev.summary: The XY problem is a logical fallacy, a faulty mental model, and a communication problem encountered in help desk and similar situations in which the real issue, X, of the person asking for help is obscured, because instead of asking directly about issue X, they ask how to solve a secondary issue, Y, which they believe will allow them to resolve issue X.

next.title: Windows Package Manager CLI
next.summary: Windows Package Manager CLI (aka winget). Contribute to microsoft/winget-cli development by creating an account on GitHub.
